segments.text: This kitchen scene is quite alarming, to be frank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water flowing from that faucet is astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a river on the kitchen floor, soaking into everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s complete obliviousness is almost insulting to common sense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just polishing away, as if nothing in the world is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, they are just asking for trouble with that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could easily come crashing down, plate and cookies flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I mean, what a mess this is going to be, a soaked floor and possibly broken dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The very thought of stepping into that cold, dirty water makes me shiver.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a complete disregard for cleanliness and safety, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene is teetering on the edge of utter chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off that tap and save the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a shame to see such a lovely kitchen potentially ruined by water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm outside is just too much to bear.
segments.speaker: PAR
